1. Aries - 6/10 - Aries are decent at saving money, but often prioritize spending on impulsive purchases.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Tauruses are known for their practicality and responsible financial habits.
3. Gemini - 4/10 - Geminis tend to be scatterbrained with finances, often neglecting budgeting and planning.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Cancers can be frugal and resourceful with money, but may struggle with spending on emotions.
5. Leo - 5/10 - Leos love to spend and indulge in luxuries, making it challenging for them to save.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Virgos are meticulous about finances and often prioritize saving and budgeting.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Libras value balance and harmony, which translates to responsible financial decisions.
8. Scorpio - 4/10 - Scorpios may struggle with spending due to their intense emotional connection to material possessions.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Sagittarians are often optimistic about their financial future, but may not prioritize saving enough.
10. Capricorn - 9/10 - Capricorns are known for their practicality and discipline when it comes to finances.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Aquarians value independence and may prioritize financial freedom over material possessions.
12. Pisces - 3/10 - Pisces often struggle with budgeting due to their emotional spending habits.
